Encounter at Dumbpoint
TerribleTrekPod Â· 101 - Encounter at DUMBPoint

Episode Title: Encounter at Farpoint

Original Airdate: 28 Sep 1987
Our heroes dive into the less than stellar pilot episode of The Next Generation, "Encounter At Farpoint." There's a spacestation mystery! An ominpotent being! Pain, and anger! Joy and gratitude!! Join us as we start off this journey by examining the not-so-great episodes of our favorite series.
